TopicTitle: Part model requires an entry purchase

Articles.Content:
Many posts on this but none that match mine.

I'm getting multiple instances of the radial parachute in the tech tree saying owned plus one that says 2800c. I can#t add the part to any craft and if I research the part, I get another instance of the parachute in the research tree and one still saying 2800c. Plus it's still not useable. Anyone any ideas please?

Thanks in advance
Sounds odd, did you mod the game at all?

Sounds odd, did you mod the game at all?

It is. Mechjeb, the soviet pack, FASA & a few others, but if memory serves, this happened before I added any mods.
I've seen this, but only when adding a mod and then attempting to continue an existing career game. Starting a new career game addressed it.

I've seen this, but only when adding a mod and then attempting to continue an existing career game. Starting a new career game addressed it.

This is the stock radial parachute, but I tried that one already. I even tried reducing the entry cost to zero and starting a new career. I still end up requiring to research the part. Anyone know how you disable the requirement to research a particular part? I've looked at the part.cfg and can't see anything different to other stock parts that don't require the extra research.

Well, I removed all the sub directories and re-installed and now it's working correctly, so it looks like a mod. Will re-install one by one and see what caused it. Will post back when I do.

Thanks to all responders.
